Question
========

In a sample of children who have experienced child maltreatment, the duration of exposure to child maltreatment is measured in number of years. What level of measurement does this variable have? 
Answerlist
----------
* Nominal
* Ordinal
* Interval
* Ratio

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
